mapper.insert: INSERT INTO states( state_id, state_name, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at, record_status) VALUES(#{stateId},#{stateName},#{createdBy},#{createdAt},#{updatedBy}, #{updatedAt},'A')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM states WHERE state_id = #{stateId} AND record_status = 'A'
mapper.update: UPDATE states SET state_name=#{stateName}, updated_by=#{updatedBy}, updated_at=#{updatedAt} WHERE state_id=#{stateId} AND record_status = 'A'
